text: Shyamkumari Devi was an Indian politician. She was a Member of Parliament, representing Madhya Pradesh in the Rajya Sabha the upper house of India's Parliament representing the Indian National Congress. ==References== Category:Rajya Sabha members from Madhya Pradesh Category:Indian National Congress politicians Category:Indian women in politics Category:1910 births Category:1984 deaths
title: Shyamkumari Devi
